body: Nkunda coments on the fight against journalists by the Rwandan government: "For years, Rwanda has argued that the press needs to be restricted because of its role in the 1994 genocide. Such a sensitive call would only be admissible if it were to be based on legitimate fact."
original_body: Nkunda coments on the fight against journalists by the Rwandan government: "For years, Rwanda has argued that the press needs to be restricted because of its role in the 1994 genocide. Such a sensitive call would only be admissible if it were to be based on legitimate fact."
title: Rwanda: Government fights journalists

sentence: Nkunda coments on the fight against journalists by the Rwandan government: "For years, Rwanda has argued that the press needs to be restricted because of its role in the 1994 genocide.
Such a sensitive call would only be admissible if it were to be based on legitimate fact."
